privacy.incognitoDescription: Your playback history will not be stored anymore.

noToken.title: Not Signed In

normalUser.title: Account:
normalUser.description: Upgrade your account now and get started with exclusive features and more.
normalUser.descriptionAPPX: Advanced features are not available in the Microsoft Store version.

premium.title: SPlayer Premium
premium.description: Go Premium now to help SPlayer change the way people watch videos, and get access to more advanced features.

explanation.title: About the Pricing
explanation.description1: Applying a complex Translation System, which supports the translation of multiple languages and the speech recognition of long duration videos, has been incurring massive ongoing maintenance costs so far. The cost is based on the duration of the video successfully processed by the system, which is approximately one dollar per hour.
explanation.description2: We are thrilled to your strong support, of which the impact and power will help us make the SPlayer better, and your adoption of the new technology will finally contribute to briding the language gaps and connecting the world.
explanation.description6: Only the monthly payment plan is available during the open beta test.

content.description1: Additional hours of AI Translation service
content.description2: Support more languages in AI Translation
content.description3: Export subtitles and translation results unlimitedly
content.description4: Your purchase history will be conserved permanently

translationEdit.quickEditDescription: Allow quick editing of the selected subtitle when the video is paused.

masVersion.content: Smart Translation function needs your consent for uploading anonymous media info to the server  side, and you will not receive translation results if you disagree. There is no privacy information will be collected.

tryToDisable.partOne: SPlayer uses anonymous data to enhance user experience. Smart Translation will be disabled if you

translate.title: About {time} Left
translate.content: Please do not skip the video or close the application. You can check the progress on the translation panel.

translate.contentGrabbing: Subtitle in source language not found, extracting audio ...

success.title: Translation Done

discard.title: AI Translation is in Progress
discard.content: Are you sure you want to quit? If you quit, the translation progress will not be restored.
